mapper.update: UPDATE emp_tb SET push_check = IF( (SELECT push_check FROM (SELECT * FROM emp_tb) a WHERE emp_seq = #{empSeq})='Y' ,'N' ,'Y') WHERE emp_seq = #{empSeq};
mapper.select: SELECT o.custmr_seq, push_check FROM ordr_num_tb o JOIN custmr_tb c ON o.custmr_seq = c.custmr_seq WHERE ordr_numbr_seq = #{ordrNumbrSeq};
SELECT emp_seq ,nme ,duty ,task ,img_rot FROM emp_tb WHERE emp_seq != #{empSeq} AND stat = 'Y'

SELECT a.ordr_stat_seq ,IFNULL(b.cnt,0) AS ordr_numbr_count FROM ordr_stat_tb a LEFT JOIN(SELECT ordr_stat_seq ,COUNT(ordr_numbr_seq) AS cnt FROM ordr_num_tb GROUP by ordr_stat_seq) b ON a.ordr_stat_seq = b.ordr_stat_seq ORDER BY ordr_stat_seq;
SELECT nme ,id ,mobl FROM emp_tb WHERE emp_seq = #{empSeq};

SELECT ordr_numbr_seq ,ordr_dat ,cart_img1 ,ordr_stat ,prodct_seq ,prodct_nme ,recvr_mobl ,SUM(ordr_prodct_amont) AS ordr_prodct_amont ,SUM(all_pric) AS all_pric FROM emp_shipng_tb WHERE ordr_stat_seq in (1,4) GROUP BY ordr_numbr_seq ORDER BY ordr_dat DESC;

SELECT o.ordr_numbr_seq ,DATE_FORMAT(ordr_dat,'%Y-%m-%d') as ordr_dat ,cart_img1 ,ordr_stat ,titl as prodct_nme ,recvr_mobl ,go.sel_pric*ordr_amont as all_pric FROM ordr_num_tb o JOIN grop_purchs_ordr_recrd_tb go ON o.ordr_numbr_seq = go.ordr_numbr_seq JOIN grop_purchs_tb gp ON gp.grop_purchs_seq = go.grop_purchs_seq JOIN ordr_stat_tb os ON o.ordr_stat_seq = os.ordr_stat_seq WHERE o.ordr_stat_seq in (1,4) ORDER BY ordr_dat DESC;

SELECT o.ordr_numbr_seq ,DATE_FORMAT(es.ordr_dat,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ordr_dat ,o.recvr_nme ,recvr_addrss ,recvr_detl_addrss ,CONCAT(HOP_DELVR_DAT,' ',HOP_DELVR_TIM) AS hop_delvr_dat ,SUM(all_pric) AS all_pric ,o.recvr_mobl ,nme ,mobl ,o.ordr_stat_seq ,o.cart_img1 FROM emp_shipng_tb es join ordr_num_tb o ON es.ordr_numbr_seq = o.ordr_numbr_seq LEFT JOIN emp_tb e ON es.emp_seq = e.emp_seq WHERE es.ordr_numbr_seq = #{ordrNumbrSeq}

SELECT o.ordr_numbr_seq ,DATE_FORMAT(ordr_dat,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ordr_dat ,recvr_nme ,CONCAT(recvr_addrss,' ',RECVR_DETL_ADDRSS) AS recvr_addrss ,CONCAT(HOP_DELVR_DAT,' ',HOP_DELVR_TIM) AS hop_delvr_dat ,go.sel_pric*ordr_amont as all_pric ,recvr_mobl ,nme ,mobl ,ordr_stat_seq ,cart_img1 FROM ordr_num_tb o JOIN grop_purchs_ordr_recrd_tb go ON o.ordr_numbr_seq = go.ordr_numbr_seq LEFT JOIN emp_tb e ON o.emp_seq = e.emp_seq WHERE o.ordr_numbr_seq = #{ordrNumbrSeq}

SELECT ordr_numbr_seq ,ordr_dat ,cart_img1 ,ordr_stat ,prodct_seq ,prodct_nme ,recvr_mobl ,SUM(ordr_prodct_amont) AS ordr_prodct_amont ,SUM(all_pric) AS all_pric FROM emp_shipng_tb WHERE ordr_stat_seq = #{ordrStatSeq} GROUP BY ordr_numbr_seq ORDER BY ordr_dat DESC;

SELECT o.ordr_numbr_seq ,DATE_FORMAT(ordr_dat,'%Y-%m-%d') as ordr_dat ,cart_img1 ,ordr_stat ,titl as prodct_nme ,recvr_mobl ,go.sel_pric*ordr_amont as all_pric FROM ordr_num_tb o JOIN grop_purchs_ordr_recrd_tb go ON o.ordr_numbr_seq = go.ordr_numbr_seq JOIN grop_purchs_tb gp ON gp.grop_purchs_seq = go.grop_purchs_seq JOIN ordr_stat_tb os ON o.ordr_stat_seq = os.ordr_stat_seq WHERE o.ordr_stat_seq != 4 AND o.ordr_stat_seq = #{ordrStatSeq} ORDER BY ordr_dat DESC;

SELECT ordr_numbr_seq ,ordr_dat ,cart_img1 ,ordr_stat ,prodct_seq ,prodct_nme ,recvr_mobl ,SUM(ordr_prodct_amont) AS ordr_prodct_amont ,SUM(all_pric) AS all_pric FROM emp_shipng_tb GROUP BY ordr_numbr_seq ORDER BY ordr_dat DESC;

SELECT ordr_numbr_seq ,ordr_dat ,cart_img1 ,ordr_stat ,prodct_seq ,prodct_nme ,recvr_mobl ,SUM(ordr_prodct_amont) AS ordr_prodct_amont ,SUM(all_pric) AS all_pric FROM emp_shipng_tb GROUP BY ordr_numbr_seq ORDER BY ordr_dat DESC limit 0, 5;

SELECT o.ordr_numbr_seq ,DATE_FORMAT(ordr_dat,'%Y-%m-%d') as ordr_dat ,cart_img1 ,ordr_stat ,titl as prodct_nme ,recvr_mobl ,go.sel_pric*ordr_amont as all_pric FROM ordr_num_tb o JOIN grop_purchs_ordr_recrd_tb go ON o.ordr_numbr_seq = go.ordr_numbr_seq JOIN grop_purchs_tb gp ON gp.grop_purchs_seq = go.grop_purchs_seq JOIN ordr_stat_tb os ON o.ordr_stat_seq = os.ordr_stat_seq WHERE o.ordr_stat_seq != 4 ORDER BY ordr_dat DESC;

SELECT ec.ordr_numbr_seq ,DATE_FORMAT(ec.ordr_dat,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ordr_dat ,prodct_nme ,SUM(ordr_prodct_amont) AS ordr_prodct_amont ,SUM(all_pric) AS all_pric ,ordr_canl_dat ,o.cart_img1 FROM emp_canl_shipng_tb ec join ordr_num_tb o on ec.ordr_numbr_seq = o.ordr_numbr_seq GROUP BY ec.ordr_numbr_seq ORDER BY ordr_dat DESC;

SELECT go.ordr_numbr_seq ,DATE_FORMAT(o.ordr_dat,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ordr_dat ,prodct_nme ,count(*) as ordr_prodct_amont ,SUM(go.ordr_amont*go.sel_pric) AS all_pric ,ordr_canl_dat ,o.cart_img1 FROM ordr_num_tb o JOIN grop_purchs_ordr_recrd_tb go ON o.ordr_numbr_seq = go.ordr_numbr_seq JOIN grop_purchs_tb gp ON gp.grop_purchs_seq = go.grop_purchs_seq JOIN ordr_stat_tb os ON o.ordr_stat_seq = os.ordr_stat_seq WHERE o.ordr_stat_seq = 4 ORDER BY ordr_dat DESC;

SELECT o.ordr_numbr_seq ,DATE_FORMAT(es.ordr_dat,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ordr_dat ,recvr_nme ,recvr_addrss ,recvr_detl_addrss ,ordr_canl_dat ,all_pric ,es.recvr_mobl ,ordr_pamnt_dat FROM emp_canl_shipng_tb es JOIN ordr_num_tb o ON es.ordr_numbr_seq = o.ordr_numbr_seq LEFT JOIN emp_tb e ON es.emp_seq = e.emp_seq WHERE es.ordr_numbr_seq = #{ordrNumbrSeq}

select p.prodct_nme ,o.ordr_amont ,o.ordr_amont*o.sel_pric AS sel_pric ,p.main_img FROM (SELECT ordr_numbr_seq ,prodct_seq ,ordr_amont ,ordr_amont*sel_pric AS sel_pric FROM ordr_recrd_tb UNION ALL SELECT ordr_numbr_seq ,prodct_seq ,ordr_amont ,ordr_amont*sel_pric AS sel_pric FROM packg_ordr_desc_tb po JOIN packg_tb p ON po.packg_seq = p.packg_Seq JOIN packg_bridg_tb pb ON pb.packg_seq = p.packg_seq ) o JOIN prodct_tb p ON o.prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq WHERE ordr_numbr_seq = #{ordrNumbrSeq};

SELECT o.ordr_numbr_seq ,DATE_FORMAT(o.ordr_dat,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ordr_dat ,recvr_nme ,recvr_addrss ,recvr_detl_addrss ,ordr_canl_dat ,ordr_amont * sel_pric as all_pric ,o.recvr_mobl ,ordr_pamnt_dat FROM ordr_num_tb o JOIN grop_purchs_ordr_recrd_tb go ON o.ordr_numbr_seq = go.ordr_numbr_seq LEFT JOIN emp_tb e ON o.emp_seq = e.emp_seq WHERE o.ordr_numbr_seq = #{ordrNumbrSeq};

SELECT g.prodct_nme ,gp.ordr_amont ,gp.ordr_amont*gp.sel_pric AS sel_pric FROM grop_purchs_ordr_recrd_tb gp JOIN grop_purchs_tb g ON gp.grop_purchs_seq = g.grop_purchs_seq WHERE ordr_numbr_seq = #{ordrNumbrSeq};
